name: df-trl
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ctrl, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clh, cv(s0)), cmpt(s2, cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), crio(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s4, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), wi(wn(wbr(cv(s4), cfv(cple, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), co(co(cv(s4), cfv(cjn, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))), cfv(cmee, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ trL =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LHyp ` s0)‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà((LTrn ` s0)` s1)‚Ü¶ iota(s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0), ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Atoms ` s0),(¬¨ s4[(le ` s0)]s1 ‚Üí s3 =((s4[(join ` s0)](s2 ` s4))[(meet ` s0)]s1)))))))
comment: Define trace of a lattice translation. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)
